<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ring of Spell Turning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=458)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 615 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 67,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This golden ring has three diamonds set into its face.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;   **Trigger** You are targeted by a spell;  **Effect** The ring replicates the effects of an 8th-level [_spell turning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) with a counteract modifier of +35, possibly causing the triggering spell to reflect back on its caster. The ring can reflect no more than 9 total levels of spells per day. If you activate the ring to reflect a spell that would exceed this limit, the attempt fails, but the attempted usage of the ring does not count toward the daily limit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
